content: Give me a list of 21 words that have 'ee' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here's a list of 21 words that contain 'ee' somewhere in them:

1. Sweet
2. Tree
3. Bee
4. Degree
5. Fee
6. See
7. Tee
8. Free
9. Glee
10. Knee
11. Leek
12. Peer
13. Reel
14. Seem
15. Teepee
16. Vee
17. Wee
18. Zee
19. Breeze
20. Creek
21. Sleeve

I hope this helps! If you need more words or have any other questions, feel free to ask.
